conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a docudrama movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM

This film is a gripping and intense portrayal of one of the most tragic events in recent history, and its real-time account will keep you on the edge of your seat. The all-star cast brings authenticity to the story, making it an unforgettable viewing experience.
